parameters: This food still looks fresh enough to eat!

This metal will be useful for buildin'.
Scrap wood will always come in handy!

Here. This can tend to your wounds!

== Story will be continued in a future update ==
Baby...\! Have you explored the apartments over in the West District?
Can't say I really have.\! Why?
I've got that soap you were looking for \n[2].
Well what are we waiting for?!\! Let's go take a bath!
Sorry.\! Maybe I'm a little too eager to try it out...
I remember hearing rumors about a sex shop somewhere on the west side of the city.
They operated in some shady alleyway to help stay out of trouble.
But that's about all I know.
I'm sure they would have some of that soap in stock!
We'll have to be careful hiding our relationship from everyone.
But with how good your dick feels, it's going to be tough staying quiet...
Let's just make sure this stays our little secret!
Good!\! \BST[5]I suppose there's no need to be reserved now...
Our baths...\! I've been thinking about this advertisement I saw for a product.
Oh ya?\! What was the product?
It was for a soap that is said to stimulate sexual intimacy.
You know how stale our soap can get...\! It makes it tough to stay in
I was thinking that if maybe you could find some of that soap...
Perhaps we could try some new things in the bath together..?
Where can I find this soap?!\! Please, tell me now \n[2]!
*giggle*\! \BST[1]I knew you wouldn't be opposed to the idea.
But finding some is the tough part...
You know, I remember rumors about a sex shop somewhere on the west side of the city.
They operated in some shady alleyway to help stay out of the spotlight.
But that's about all I know.
A sketchy alleyway on the west side of town.\! \BST[2]I'll find it!
Now don't forget to be careful out there, babe!
If you get injured then that would mean no bath time with \n[11]...
WARNING: A dangerous aura can be felt.\! It might be a while until you
How are you feeling now that you've taken some medicine?
It's such a relief not feeling so congested any more...
Are you okay, \n[1]?\! You seem pale as a ghost.
I think you should take today off and rest.
You need to listen to your body, you know!
I'm okay...\! There's too much to do still!
I've taken some of that medicine!
I wish the effects were immediate...\! *sniffle*
But I'm sure I'll be feeling as good as new tomorrow!
*sniffle*\! Some medicine certainly would be nice to have in times like these...
But I am healthy enough to go with you to the Crimson City Hospital!
Two heads are better than one!
I suppose I might be coming down with a cold of some sort...
Do you have a fever?\! Is your head cloudy?!
Relax honey.\! It's just a little head cold.\! *sniffle*
Sorry \n[2]...\! Those nightmares of mine just have me a little paranoid.
You worry too much dear.\! \BST[1]You have such a kind and gentle heart.
If you do wish to help, gathering some medicine wouldn't be a bad idea.
Especially in the case of others getting sick around here too!
I can gather up some medicinal herbs for everyone!
I'm afraid those probably won't work for a head cold.
More traditional medicine is probably a better idea.
Where do you suppose I can find that?
There is the Crimson City Hospital...
I could probably take some medicine in their pharmacy area!
Well, 'take' might not be quite right...
I don't think zombies will really mind some missing medicine.
Well if you need help, I do feel strong enough to go with you!
I can make sure you don't end up lost or fetch the wrong medicine.
How has exploring the city gone, honey?
It's alright.\! But I feel like I'm a little stuck right now.
Being able to expand our horizons would probably lead to more opportunities...
Just continue to be safe and explore each district!\! Maybe you can even find more survivors!
Continue to unlock new areas of Crimson City to continue with \n[2]'s story!
Thank you for bringing me a bottle of wine!
It will be nice to have a glass and unwind a bit for dinner.
And I didn't forget my part of the deal!\! \BST[1]I'll cook your favorite meal for dinner next time!
[Whenever \n[2] drinks wine, she tends to really loosen up...]
Oh!\! \BST[1]Did you bring me a bottle of wine?
I won't forget your part of the deal, you know.
Next dinner, I'll cook you your favorite meal!
\n[2]'s "Compliment" option has been upgraded to "Sweet Talk" while eating dinner!
You haven't forgotten about my bottle of wine, have you?
Once you bring me a bottle, I'll cook your favorite meal!
I'm not sure I know how to get any wine though...
If you're not sure how to get wine, maybe search that restaraunt in the West District.
I noticed they had a bar when we first visited.\! \BST[5]They might have
The restaurant in the West District, I'll check it out.
\n[2]...\! Last time you were taking a shower...
I saw that you were really enjoying it...
[Who am I kidding?\! I purposely left the door slightly cracked.]
[Did I-\! Did I want him to see me..?]
I-\! I can't stop thinking about how much I wanted to help you do that.
[It's impossible to avoid but he has such a large erection.\! Is he-\| thinking about..?]
Well, um.\! It's probably best that I leave you to some priva-
Instead of being alone, could I try doing that to you instead next time we bathe together?
Honey...\! I'm afraid that's a line we shouldn't cross.
T-That's just simply too vulgar and inappropriate for a \n[5] and \n[8] to be doing!
[He looks so disappointed.\! Declining is the proper answer to a question like that, right?]
I'm sorry honey.\! \BST[5]Why don't we change the subject.
You'll be joining us tomorrow again for dinner, right?
Will you be joining us for dinner again tonight?
Exploring the city for resources is important, but so is your nutrition!
Ya, I'll try and make it to dinner this time.
You don't have to look so sad dear...
How about this-\! I'll cook you your favorite meal!
I'd love to!\! \BST[5]But could you do me a favor as well?
I wouldn't mind having my favorite drink to go along with dinner.
It's been so long since I relaxed with a nice glass of wine.
Would you be able to bring me a bottle of wine, sweetie?
Just a bottle of wine?\! \BST[2]I can do that, no problem!
I'm not sure I know how to get any wine though...
That is a problem...\! I wonder about that restaraunt in the West District.
I noticed they had a bar when we first visited.\! \BST[5]Maybe they have
The restaurant in the West District, I'll check it out.
Thank you so much dear!\! \BST[1]I'm just glad to see that smile of yours!
I do hope those nightmares of yours don't become a frequent occurrence.
But if they do, you're more than welcome to come sleep with me.
Oh my.\! I guess that did sound a little inappropriate.
Well, you know what I mean, right..?
A-Anyways, don't forget to join us for dinner!
Thank you for worrying about me, sweetie.
But I don't want you worrying yourself sick, okay?
We all have each other for support around here to stay safe from
You're right \n[2].\! I should trust in everyone a bit more around here.
We're pretty resourceful ourselves too, you know!
The room key says "Room 201" on it.
Fiona said this key should belong to the Crimson Apartments in the East District.
I think it's that big red brick building south of the Convenience Store.
When you're ready to search there, let me know.
So, um...\! Is there anything new going on with the city?
Ah!\! I almost forgot to tell you!
Fiona found a key laying around the other day and gave it to me.
She said the key might belong to the Crimson Apartments in the East District.
I thought that maybe we could search it and look for any valuable supplies.
That's great!\! \BST[1]I'll take that key from you and go-
I want to come along with you this time.
What?! No, \n[2]!\! I can't put you in danger.
And you expect me to do the same to you?
I'll just hang onto this key then and go search by myself.
I'll take you with me when we go search the room.
*giggle*\! That's more like it, young man.
We can go and search the room whenever you are ready.
What happened the other night is completely normal.
Let's just carry on as usual and focus on surviving.
If.. you'd like to still take a bath, I can prepare another one for us.
Have you been managing well in the city, honey?
Y-Yeah...\! Scavenging has been going okay.
You know, \n[1].\! You don't have to be embarrassed about the other night.
It's only natural that someone your age would react in such a way.
I should have acted more calmly about the situation.
I'm sorry for letting that happen.
We will just carry on as usual and we won't tell anyone about what happened.
Good.\! \BST[7]Well, if you feel comfortable enough...
I can prepare another bath for us tonight.
I know you must be awfully busy...
But don't forget to make time to relax.
I will have the bath prepared tonight if you would care to join me.
Did you enjoy our bath, sweetie?
It was great!\! \BST[5]I barely even remember it.
That's because you dozed off for most of it, silly.
Hah hah!\! \BST[1]Your back rubbing was so comfortable!
Well, it makes me happy knowing you can relax for a short time.
Since you enjoyed our bath so much, I'll prepare another one tonight.
You are more than welcome to join me again, honey.
Tonight, I'll prepare the bath for the both of us.
Don't be shy!\! Just knock and I'll be ready.
I'm guessing you talked with Fiona about the bathroom bench.
She insisted on coming in and installing it herself.
I didn't even have time to clean up before she rushed in...
Hah.\! Ya, Fiona never seems to slow down when she's focused on
Well she did a wonderful job.
The craftsmanship of that bench is immaculate!
I think she'll be a wonderful ally to have if we need to build
Not to change the topic or anything, but now that we have the bench...
You're that eager to take a bath with \n[11], aren't you?!
We can take one as soon as tonight, if you would like to.
I'll make sure to get the soap and water prepared!
I'm so happy you're looking forward to spending time with your \n[5]!
If you'd like to take a bath together, we'll need a bathroom bench.
The bath tub might be a little too tight for both of us to fit into.
Maybe that kind woman, Fiona, can help build one for us?
You should mention it to her when you have a chance.
Hey \n[2].\! I was thinking about that offer to take a bath-
You want to share a bath with your \n[5]?!
Oh, that would just fill my heart with joy!
Well, I mean, I was just thinking it would help save on water and stuff.
That's an excellent idea!\! \BST[6]There is one tiny issue, however.
The bath tub may be a little too small for the two of us.
Both of us trying to squeeze in there may be a little inappropriate.
If we had some kind of bench to put in the bathroom...
Then you could sit on that and I could help wash your back!
A bench to sit on...\! I wonder how I could get one of those.
Maybe that kind woman Fiona can help you?
With her new workshop, I bet she can craft one quite easily.
You've met that kind woman Fiona, right?
I heard she was trying to build a work station near the townhome.
If she can build that, then maybe she'll be able to help craft one.
Okay.\! I'll talk to Fiona and see if we can build one!
Don't forget to take care of yourself out there!
I know it may not seem important but good hygiene is still essential.
Don't forget my bath offer still stands!
It'll be just like when you were younger.
[Why do I keep thinking about her bathing?!]
Have you been having luck finding more food and water around the city?
I think so.\! \BST[5]But keeping supplies up is going to be difficult.
If we are going to survive, we're going to need to really bunker down.
And you've been remembering to take care of yourself, right?
I guess I'm doing alright.\! I haven't had much time to think about it.
Make sure you're getting plenty of rest.\! And don't forget to bathe too!
If it's not too embarassing, we can bathe together like when you were younger.
N-No, I don't think that's necessary!
[Bathing with \n[2]...\! She's so pretty, I don't think I could stay calm.]
Oh...\! I understand.\! \BST[1]You're all big and mature now!
But if you don't take care of yourself, I'll drag you into the bath
Hah!\! \BST[1]I got it. I got it, \n[2].
Good!\! \BST[1]Now you be careful out there.
Err, how about we not talk about those zombies anymore today.
If we are going to stay safe here, there's a ton of work to get done!
[\n[2] still seems caught off guard over my question.]
[Maybe I should lay off and talk to her again tomorrow.]
Are you feeling a little better today, \n[1]?
A little bit, yeah.\! \BST[5]I still can't believe this is all happening though.
Me either, honey.\! \BST[4]But we're going to have to be strong!
Always know that you have me and \n[3] to help you.
If you don't mind the company, we can even go with you while you
I can act as another pair of eyes and ears for you.
Ya, that might be pretty helpful.
Just...\! Don't go out there alone, okay?
After what I witnessed some of the zombies doing, I would never dare to.
Oh, that's right.\! What exactly did you and \n[3] see out there?
Ah!\! \BST[5]U-Um, it's nothing to worry about honey.
[Why is she so flustered about that?\! What could they have seen?]
Well, if you need me, I have some work I need to tend to.
H-Hey, don't go around telling anyone about what happened, okay?
You know, I wouldn't mind another massage soon.
Stacy really is a joy to have around here.
That girl is always bouncing off the walls with energy!
It's hard for me to keep up with sometimes...
Hmm.\! I wonder how Stacy is doing.
It could be good to reconnect with old aquaintances...
Hey \n[1], have you ever bothered to check that run down Arcade in the East District?
I guess I never properly thanked you for saving my tail back at the library.
You really charged that zombie with everything you had!
I guess I just thought about all the times you were there for me when I needed you.
To be honest, it felt really nice to be needed instead for once.
We all need your help around here!
You just wanna fuck again, don't you?!
Well that makes two of us!
I'm ready for our trip to Crimson City High School whenever you are!
Right...\! How do we get back there again..?
Hmmm...\! The school is just above the West District.
Maybe there are some buildings or an alleyway that we can sneak through!
The school is just above the West District.
There should be an alleyway over there that can lead into it!
But don't pull a fast one and scavenge without me!
Hey \n[3], are you feeling better now?
Ya, I suppose I'm doing a bit better.
Has something been weighing on your mind or something?
I know our situation here probably isn't much help...
But I want to make sure you have a smile on your face, \n[3]!
I guess, I just worry a lot about whether or not I'm helpful around here.
Of course you are!\! You haven't noticed that yet?!
I try to.\! I guess I just struggle with my own self esteem sometimes.
Well then let's go on a scavenge mission!
You and me can go exploring to bring back some supplies!
Except-\! I'm not sure where we should go.
How about Crimson City High School?
Hah!\! A back to school field trip!
Do you remember any storage rooms in there?
Just beyond the library is a storage room.
I'd spend a lot of my free time reading so I remember seeing teachers moving boxes through there.
One time I even saw two teachers go in together...
We'll both take a trip to the library and see if there's anything good we can find.
But...\! how do we get back there again..?
Hmmm...\! The school is just above the West District.
Maybe there are some buildings or an alleyway that we can sneak through!
Hey...\! If you are willing, another massage would be great to have.
I would certainly love to get another massage soon.
I-If you're not too busy, that is.
Hey \n[3].\! I wanted to give you this.
You handed over the Nostalgic Flower!
I remember you loved picking these at Camp Zomi.
So I thought it would cheer you up a little bit.
Hah hah!\! \BST[1]There's the sweet and loving \n[6] I'm used to.
No one has ever gone out of their way for me like this...
You made me feel so special.\! Thank you, \n[1].
This will help me forget about my aching back for a little while!
Oh no!\! Is your back hurting you again?!
Ya. Looks like your massage has started to wear off now.
You'd think I'd get used to having... 'these'.
But my back still gets sore from time to time.
I remember when they started to get bigger during school...
All of the girls used to make fun of me about it.\! It made me feel so alone.
That sounds so mean.\! I'm sorry you had to go through that.
When you would avoid me too-\! I started thinking that maybe something was wrong with me.
No!\! I wasn't avoiding you because of that!
When I would see your body, I'd just get really nervous...
I-\| I really enjoyed seeing your body.
Well, I guess, I mean-\! I still do.
I just think you're really pretty \n[3].
W-Well, if you're willing to give me another massage later...
Sorry for being so down in the dumps lately.
Staying positive right now is definitely a challenge.
[\n[3] used to love these flowers that grew in Camp Zomi.]
[Maybe I could find some for her in a park or something?]
I've been thinking about Camp Zomi lately...
We had such a good time that summer!
Remember hanging in the Rec Center?\! \BST[5]I'd always beat you at pool!
That was one time!\! \BST[3]You beat me one time!
I think you might be forgetting some details there.
Hah.\! \BST[5]That summer went so fast, it's like a blur in my memory.
I guess that's what happens when you're having too much fun.
I'll make sure we have some fun here too!
We can't be all work and no play all the time, right?
Sorry for being such a drag.\! I guess I just need a little pick-me-up.
[\n[3] used to love these flowers that grew in Camp Zomi.]
[Maybe I could find some for her in a park or something?]
What's going on in that head of yours..?
Did you still want that massage, \n[3]?
If you're still offering, that would be nice.
While we're both here on this couch, now would be as good of a time as
Just tell me when you're ready!
It's a bit early, but I suppose a massage now wouldn't hurt.
If you're ready, it'll certainly help get me started on my day!
During the evening, I like to relax on the couch.
That would be an excellent time to fit in a comfortable massage!
I think running around helping everyone has really started to
You should probably take a break then.\! I don't want you getting
Thanks for worrying but we don't have time for that.
I can't sit around and be a burden.
And you know what they say-\| no rest for the weary.
You have to dedicate some time for resting at least!
Well then I'll just hire you to be my personal masseur.
Well, I just meant it as a joke but...
If you want to give me a massage, I won't complain about that.
While we're both here on this couch, now would be as good of a time as
Just tell me when you're ready!
It's a bit early, but I suppose a massage now wouldn't hurt.
If you're ready, it'll certainly help get me started on my day!
During the evening, I like to relax on the couch.
That would be an excellent time to fit in a comfortable massage!
I suppose for now, it's best to just keep searching for supplies.
And if you find any survivors, be sure to bring them back here!
I'll welcome them with a pair of keys and a place to stay!
Zombies...\! Just- \|how the hell is any of this real?!
I'm still struggling to believe it as well.
I guess we don't have the luxury to think about it all day.
While you've been out in the city, I've been helping Fiona around here.
She gave me some keys to the Motel rooms near our Townhouse.
If you are able to find any survivors out there, we can give them
Every person we can rescue will help us rebuild!
I know we'll get through this with all of us together.
Heh.\! I'm pretty sure you know...
Any time we're alone.\! Just say the word.
== Story will be continued in a future update ==
We'll only be able to uncover my stalker's identity if we go to him.
It might be dangerous, but we have to go upstairs in my old
Just make sure you're prepared for anything before we go.
Ahh ~ I feel so renewed and rejuvenated!
I've slept like an angel and I'm not sure why!
[Does she not even remember giving me a blowjob?!]
Whatever the reason, it's filled me with a ton of confidence!
So, if you don't mind, I think we should tackle the stalker head on!
You mean you want to go upstairs in your building?\! The place we've seen it
At this point, I think it's the only way we'll uncover their identity...
We don't have to do it if you don't want to...
Well, it's not that.\! It's just we have no idea how dangerous he could be.
But I won't let some creep get away with stealing your panties!
So you'll do it?\! You'll help me?!
That makes me so happy!\! \BST[1]I was worried about what you would think.
So we need to go back to your apartment and scope out the upstairs this time, right?
I'm so excited to have a mixed drink during our next dinner.
Be careful!\! I can get quite flirty when I've had a cocktail.
Is that my bottle of vodka?!
One premium drink with your name on it!
I can't wait to mix a new drink next dinner.
I hope you'll be joining us.
Aw, you got me excited for a second.
I can't wait to have a bottle of Premium Vodka again!
You should see how I get after I've had a nice cocktail.
I'll craft up a new bottle for you soon!
I'm not sure I know how to get any vodka though...
I would start by checking that restaraunt in the West District.
They had an excellent bar so maybe they have a recipe book somewhere.
The restaurant in the West District, I'll check it out.
That was a really dangerous situation we were in, wasn't it?
Wait.\! Are you talking about the stalker or when..?
Anyway, I have a favor to ask.
Your \n[5] does a wonderful job cooking dinner but I've been craving a
Is there any chance you can find some of my favorite Premium Vodka
so I can properly mix my drink?
Premium vodka?\! \BST[2]Sure! That shouldn't be an issue.
I'm not sure I know how to get any vodka though...
Hmm ~ I remember a diner just south of my apartment.
I used to grab dinner there quite often and they had a wonderful
Maybe they have a recipe book or something for different drinks?
The restaurant in the West District, I'll check it out.
Thanks dear.\! If you manage to find a bottle, just bring it to me, okay?
Maybe my stalker was the apartment manager...\! But...
Anyway.\! Let's go back to my apartment as soon as you're ready.
I have a key that can take us to his office in the basement.
I think I may know who the stalker is.
Well I can't say for certain.\! But I'm thinking it might be
Of the apartments I lived in, yes.
I've ran into him a couple of times so he knows who I am.
But he also would have keys to every apartment in the building.
What?!\! \BST[5]So you think he was sneaking into your apartment when you were gone?
So what's our plan of action then?
Since I was a resident, I have a key to the leasing office.
Ahh!\! So we're going to sneak into his office and find your stolen panties, right?
So let's go back to my apartment as soon as possible, alright?
My stalker might still be around...
Give me some time to think about things, okay?
I think you forgot to take this, \n[7] \n[4]...
How about you hang onto that for now ~ ♥️
Don't pretend like you aren't excited, \n[10].
Between your blush and that bulge, you certainly are an easy book to read.
But I am worried about my panties going missing...
And you think it was your stalker, right?
What do you suppose we do about him?
I'll need some time to think about it.
I need to go back to my apartment in the West District.
I can go with you as soon as you are all prepared!
No, no, no...\! Where are they..?
I can help you look for it!
Uhh!\! \BST[4]I don't think I can really say.
But I'm worried I may have left them- I mean, my items back at
Well if you stay put here, I'll go and-
Really?\! Are you sure I can't just go?
I could use a bodyguard to keep me safe.
Just promise me you won't look while I'm searching, alright?
Thank you for helping me earlier.
Maybe tomorrow I'll have another favor to ask of you ~ ♥️
I keep having trouble reaching some dishes in the kitchen.
[\n[7] \n[4] is normally in the kitchen during the Day, right?]
Next time I'll try and help out!
There's no need to worry about a thing!
If you ever need anything from me, please don't be afraid to ask.
But tomorrow's always a new day.\! \BST[5]I'm sure something will come up.
One minute I was napping, the next I heard this terrible alarm.
I left my apartment to see what was happening and...
So everyone turned into zombies during that alarm, right?
When I heard that alarm, my head just started pounding...
I don't remember much after that.
Well, at least you managed to stay safe through all of it.
So now we make ourselves comfortable, right?
If you ever need anything from me, please don't be afraid to ask.
I hope you're finding plenty of resources out there!
With your help, The Grid has really started to come along.
And if you ever feel like you need to recharge, I can always take a lunch break...
I'm sure we both could use a little time to rest and relax!
